title: Firefox macOS 112.0 won't quit - it starts and stops many instances of Firefox
content:
Firefox macOS V112.0 fires up many copies of itself when the "Quit" menu choice is selected. This behavior has been seen on both a M1 and M2 MacBook Pro running Ventura 13.3.1. This behavior started when the 112 update was applied.

I've deleted and then reinstalled Firefox. This did not change the behavior.
creator: dan48

title: not possible to read an Excel sheet document and the QR code
content:
many years I was a Firefox user. But since I use the OS W10 of lately W11 there are some issues I can´t deal with and have to use Chrome. why are these issue still going on? with this description I don´n need to make a screen shot of the issue for sure, do I?

title: High number of processes/high CPU usage while watching youtube
content: While watching youtube, CPU usage on a DELL latitude, intel i5 @2.4GHz, jumps to 80-90%. I hear the fans spinning up and open task manager to find 15 processes of firefox. This stops when I change tab (no longer on the youtube tab, but the video is still playing) and the CPU usage drops to a safer 20%. Is this normal or is there somethig strange going on?
creator: ozzyridley

title: uložení  všech otevřených panelů ve Firefoxu pro příští sezení
content: je možné uložit poslední vzhled Firefoxu, a pak jej třeba za měsíc opět vyvolat. (příklad: mam otevřený prohlížeč Firefox s deseti aktivními záložkami – panely na téma sport, toto bych chtěl uložit, druhy den mám otevřených pět záložek na téma zahrada, též toto bych chtěl někam uložit, než počítač vypnu). Příští den po novem spuštěni počítače bych chtěl vyvolat jedno z těchto zapamatovaných témat, tzn. aby se najednou otevřely všechny záložky na zvolené téma. Děkuji
creator: fistul

title: Firefox search suggestions in Google
content:
If I start entering a search word in the FF address bar it brings up FF suggestions based on my prior searching.

If I enter “Google.com”, a new screen opens & shows a Google search box in the center. If I start entering a search word it brings up Google’s suggestions. But it used to bring up the Firefox suggestions followed by the Google suggestions. IOW both. This function stopped working about when Firefox updated about a week ago.

This is how it used to look. I tried changing all the usual settings but to avail. Any suggestions how to bring this back? Thanks
creator: Mike109

title: Firefox creates almost 200 processes on exit, 100% CPU
content:
Hello,

When I close Firefox after the last update (current installed version: 112.0 x64 Windows 10), Firefox creates almost 200 processes (in the latest case 177), each using from 17 MB to 65 MB RAM (except one that is using over 200 MB - I guess the main one) using 100% CPU for about half a minute, and in that my PC is unusable - everything hangs. It takes a bit more time to close all of them.

Any ideas what could be wrong and how to fix it?

Thank you.
creator: Red-Herring

title: WordPress plugin bugs in Firefox
content: Good morning My name is Manel, and I am a Firefox user, since its inception. I have a WordPress page that works perfectly in Opera, Edge, Safari, etc., but in Firefox, some plugins I'm using don't work, specifically this plugin is called Complianz, it's a cookie manager. The most curious thing is that from the frontend, it looks and works, but when I exit the frontend and run the page, the cookie warning does not appear. On the other hand, with Firefox on Android, there is no plugin problem, they work fine, it only happens to me with the PC. I am attaching two screenshots, one with the web page where the plugin does not appear and the other with the frontend, where it does appear, I have marked it in green. Any solution? Thank you.
creator: mannix

title: Error try to accessing a certain website
content:
I am trying to access PDB (Protein Data Bank) but the followinf error keeps appearing:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to www.rcsb.org. PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR

Error code: PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.


Note that I have 2 laptops, one macbook and one linux. This error appears when I try to access the website from my mac, but doesn't on my linux or my phone. Also, keep in mind that I already tried uninstall Firefox, delete cookis and data or even try another browser (Safari & Chrome), but nothing worked. Also, I have the latest version of Firefox (112.0).
creator: alextafanidis

title: Deleted firefox account, secondary email is still in use
content:
I had a Firefox account with a primary and a secondary email address. A couple weeks ago I decide to delete this account using the Delete Account in the Firefox profile page (accounts.firefox.com -> settings -> profile -> Delete account button at the bottom). Then, I wanted to create a new profile with the secondary email address from the former (now is deleted) account. Surprisingly accounts.firefox.com thinks that the secondary email still in use, because I can't register with it. Even if I create a new account with some email, and I try to add the secondary email as secondary email, I get the error message, that "This email was already confirmed by another user". Which is not possible since I deleted the account.

So, what can I do?
creator: bpeter.sub

title: Firefox logs me out of all accounts
content:
Since a couple of days ago, whenever I restart my computer, I am completely logged out of everything - it seems as though Firefox is automatically deleting all cookies etc, although no such setting has been made, and I have changed nothing. I googled for solutions, to no avail.

In History I have: Remember browsing and download history Remember search and form history Activated.

I am not in private mode.

This is very irritating - especially for 2 step verification.
creator: utalotharingia

title: Firefox freezes when I try to read Sydney Morning Herald
content: I have an on-line subscription to the Sydney Morning Herald. Recently, every time I try to read an article, Firefox freezes. I can read SMH okay on my iPad. If I transfer the SMH Article URL into Edge everything works okay. What have they done to Firefox?
creator: vagulus

title: links from web page open a new tab,  the new web page is blank?
content: I'm using Firefox 112.0 on a mac desktop running OS10.13.6. when I go to a webpage- for example-Bing.com, and I click on one of the story links, that page opens. the page will have a short description of topic, and links to go to other websites for more info. when I select one of those links to open, as usual a new tab opens, but recently, when the new tap opens, instead of displaying the web page from the link, a blank page is displayed (with the URL from the link displayed on top). refreshing the page doesn't help. If I manually copy the url from the new tab, and manually open a new tab and paste in the same url, the page associated with that link opens normally. Why doesn't this happen when I first click on a link to view ? this started over the last few days. I'm running in private mode. (I switched to regular mode but it didn't help)  ?? help please thank you
creator: rfg39

I don't create new logins very often, but I would like it to work as advertised. Cheers.
